alert.note: Alert for Dale; Henry (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 6:10PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Dale and southwestern Henry Counties through 700 PM CDT... At 610 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles south of Blue Springs, or 11 miles northeast of Ozark, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Headland, Ozark, Fort Novosel, Midland City, Newton, Pinckard, Newville, Napier Field, Bells Crossroads, Hunt Field, Waterford, Tumbleton, Kirkland Crossroads, Mabson, Arguta, Snells Crossroads, Ewell, Headland Municipal A/P, Sylvan Grove and Skipperville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
